ygData.subject: NullPointerException when writing to ARC file
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello, I recently changed the machine I am doing crawls on. Now every time I try to run a crawl I get a NullPointerException - even doing the Charset

From: Andrea Goethals <andrea_goethals@...>
Subject: NullPointerException when writing to ARC file
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=241416423

Hello,

I recently changed the machine I am doing crawls on. Now every time I try 
to run a crawl I get a NullPointerException - even doing the Charset 
self-test. These are the kind of entries I'm getting in my console & 
heritrix_out.log:

Message:  	

Problem java.lang.NullPointerException occured when trying to process 
'http://127.0.0.1:8181/robots.txt' at step ABOUT_TO_BEGIN_PROCESSOR in Archiver
(in processor Archiver)

java.lang.NullPointerException
Stacktrace: java.lang.NullPointerException
	at 
org.archive.crawler.writer.ARCWriterProcessor.write(ARCWriterProcessor.java:492)
	at 
org.archive.crawler.writer.ARCWriterProcessor.writeHttp(ARCWriterProcessor.java:417)
	at 
org.archive.crawler.writer.ARCWriterProcessor.innerProcess(ARCWriterProcessor.java:394)
	at org.archive.crawler.framework.Processor.process(Processor.java:103)
	at org.archive.crawler.framework.ToeThread.processCrawlUri(ToeThread.java:306)
	at org.archive.crawler.framework.ToeThread.run(ToeThread.java:153)


I can kind of see from the source why the NullPointerException might be 
thrown. In the ArcWriterProcessor when an IOException is thrown, on line 
489 the writer is being set to null. Then in the finally clause on line 492 
it tries to call getPosition() on the null writer.

The arc files are being written with the invalid suffix. I don't know why 
the IOException occurs if that is what's happening. I was able to do crawls 
on a different machine (both linux, both heritrix 1.6). Any help is 
appreciated.

thanks,
Andrea
